structural_units.address:
Raekoja plats 2
20307 Narva linn, 
Ida-Virumaa 
EST

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The subject introduces the modern approach to career planning and supports students in becoming aware of their own career choices and related needs for development through gemlike and interactive pair- and group work activities.
description.et: Aines tutvutakse karjääriplaneerimise kaasaegsete käsitlustega ning läbi mänguliste ja interaktiivsete individuaal- paari- ja rühmategevuste mõtestatakse enda karjäärivalikuid ning arenguvajadusi

objectives.en: To support students in interaction with peers in the process of planning their career.
objectives.et: Toetada õppijat interaktsioonis kaaslastega karjääri planeerimisel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the subject a student:
- understands the essence of career planning;
- can define their personal development goals related to career choices and planning.
learning_outcomes.et: -	oskab sõnastada karjäärivalikutega seonduvaid isiklikke arengueesmärke
